student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi! Did you know the Mona Lisa is a very famous painting? It’s by Leonardo da Vinci.
Great! Did you also know it was painted in the 1500s? It’s in the Louvre Museum in Paris now.
Yes, I know it is in Paris.
Nice! The Mona Lisa is famous for her smile. People call it mysterious. Have you seen it in person?
No, I have not seen it in person.
That’s okay! Maybe you can visit the Louvre one day. It’s a beautiful painting to see up close. Thanks for chatting about the Mona Lisa with me!
You’re welcome! I hope to see it one day.
Good job! You have completed the task. I hope you get to see the Mona Lisa soon. Talk to you later!
